name: The Longest Voyage
description:
THE LONGEST VOYAGE

Two months after embarking on a voyage to explore the arctic the captain has gone missing.  As the first mate, it is your job to keep the crew fed, and happy while you complete the journey. Will you uncover the mysteries of the unknown, or remain ignorant.

The Longest Voyage is a Psychological Horror Resource Management game designed for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Created by Team "This is our future"

"This is our future" is...
